description:
There’s a new community standard for container metadata in town, with contributors from Puppet, Mesosphere, Microscaling Systems, Container Solutions, Weave, Cloud66, Tigera and others. The release candidate of Label Schema was launched on 09/09 at Container Camp in London.

You can learn more and get involved here - http://label-schema.org/rc1/
title: Label Schema - A New Standard Approach to Container Metadata
